titles.title: Denying Chinese Investors Access to U.S. Small Business Aid Act of 2018
A bill to prohibit certain business concerns from receiving assistance from the Small Business Administration, and for other purposes.
Denying Chinese Investors Access to U.S. Small Business Aid Act of 2018

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Small Business and Entrepreneurship.

bill.summary:
Denying Chinese Investors Access to U.S. Small Business Aid Act of 2018
This bill prohibits companies that are headquartered in China, are connected to China's government, or have more than 25% of voting stock owned by China's citizens from qualifying as small business concerns that may receive assistance from the Small Business Administration.
